Class Commands.Move

  • net.corda.finance.contracts.asset.Cash.Commands.Move
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CommandData, MoveCommand
    Enclosing interface:
    Cash.Commands

    public static class Commands.Move
implements MoveCommand

    A command stating that money has been moved, optionally to fulfil another contract.
